Title: Le Trou
Writer: José Giovanni (novel), Jacques Becker (adaptation), José Giovanni (adaptation), Jean Aurel (adaptation), Jacques Becker (dialogue), José Giovanni (dialogue)
Actors: Michel Constantin, Jean Keraudy, Philippe Leroy, Raymond Meunier
Plot: Just as four cell-mates are about to launch their elaborate escape from a tiny cell, a detainee from a cell-block under repair is transferred in. The four all face certain conviction and long sentences. Does the young new jail-mate have the same incentive and if so, can they trust him?
Awards: Nominated for 2 BAFTA Film Awards. Another 2 wins & 2 nominations.
